name: Tesla Legacy
description: With the downfall of the genius Nikola Tesla, all his proprieties were auctioned, among them the Wardenclyffe facility. Under this facility, Tesla’s technology was secretly used to create powerful combat machines. Your task is simple: eliminate all robots. Put on your Virtual Reality goggles to experience a new combat system based on the power of electricity, with a lightning gun and a Tesla coil. Explore this secret facility, play with lightning, and defeat all combat robots. You will be getting new upgrades each fight, but every time it is going to be more challenging.
